custom_date: SELECT timestamp_value FROM custom_date WHERE date_name = 'CUSTOM_DATE'

mb_money.mb_money_campaign_details: SELECT * FROM campaign_configuration WHERE campaign_id IN (SELECT MAX(campaign_id) FROM campaign_configuration WHERE name = ? GROUP BY campaign_id)
mb_money.update_mb_money_campaign: UPDATE campaign_configuration SET effective_date = ?, expiration_date = ? WHERE campaign_id = ?
mb_money.mb_money_exclusions: SELECT * FROM campaign_exclusion WHERE campaign_id IN (SELECT MAX(campaign_id) FROM campaign_configuration WHERE name = ? GROUP BY campaign_id)
mb_money.mb_money_attributes: SELECT * FROM campaign_attribute WHERE campaign_id IN (SELECT MAX(campaign_id) FROM campaign_configuration WHERE name = ? GROUP BY campaign_id)

product.product_department: SELECT * FROM product_corp_class WHERE product_id IN (?)

order_service.prepare_order_details: SELECT * FROM orderlog WHERE order_number = '?' and SERVICE_NAME = 'PREPARE_ORDER_REQUEST'
order_service.adjusted_base_fee: SELECT ADJUSTED_BASE_FEE FROM order WHERE ORDER_NUMBER = '?'
order_service.base_fee: SELECT BASE_FEE FROM order WHERE ORDER_NUMBER = '?'
order_service.order_discount_description: select ORDER_DISC_DESC from order_discount where ORDER_NUMBER = '?'
order_service.order_promocode: SELECT ATTR_VALUE FROM order_attributes WHERE order_number = '?' and ATTR_NAME = 'PROMO_CODES'
order_service.order_attributes: SELECT ATTR_NAME, ATTR_VALUE FROM order_attributes WHERE ORDER_NUMBER = ?
order_service.order_confirmation_message_status: SELECT status FROM order_confirmation_message WHERE ORDER_NUMBER = '?'
order_service.eps_authorization_request: SELECT * FROM EPS_LOG WHERE ORDER_NUMBER = ? and SERVICE_NAME = 'EPS_AUTHORIZATION_REQUEST'
order_service.eps_paypal_authorization_request: SELECT * FROM EPS_LOG WHERE ORDER_NUMBER = ? and SERVICE_NAME = 'EPS_PAYPAL_AUTHORIZATION_REQUEST'
order_service.eps_authorization_response: SELECT * FROM EPS_LOG WHERE ORDER_NUMBER = ? and SERVICE_NAME = 'EPS_AUTHORIZATION_RESPONSE'
order_service.eps_paypal_authorization_response: SELECT * FROM EPS_LOG WHERE ORDER_NUMBER = ? and SERVICE_NAME = 'EPS_PAYPAL_AUTHORIZATION_RESPONSE'

wallet_promo: SELECT wallet_offer_property.OFFER_BARCODE, wallet_offer_property.STORE_OFFER_CODE, promo_code.promotion_code FROM promotion INNER JOIN promo_attr_val ON promo_attr_val.promotion_id = promotion.promotion_id INNER JOIN promo_code ON promo_code.promotion_id = promotion.promotion_id LEFT OUTER JOIN wallet_offer_property on wallet_offer_property.promotion_id = promotion.promotion_id RIGHT OUTER JOIN (select promotion_id, attr_name, attr_value from promo_attr_val) pav on pav.promotion_id = promotion.promotion_id WHERE promo_attr_val.attr_name = 'IS_WALLET_ELIGIBLE' AND promo_attr_val.attr_value = 'Y' AND promotion.promotion_exp_date >= ? AND wallet_offer_property.OFFER_BARCODE IS NOT NULL AND wallet_offer_property.STORE_OFFER_CODE IS NOT NULL
wallet_promo_global: SELECT wallet_offer_property.OFFER_BARCODE, wallet_offer_property.STORE_OFFER_CODE, promo_code.promotion_code FROM promotion INNER JOIN promo_attr_val ON promo_attr_val.promotion_id = promotion.promotion_id INNER JOIN promo_code ON promo_code.promotion_id = promotion.promotion_id LEFT OUTER JOIN wallet_offer_property on wallet_offer_property.promotion_id = promotion.promotion_id RIGHT OUTER JOIN (select promotion_id, attr_name, attr_value from promo_attr_val) pav on pav.promotion_id = promotion.promotion_id WHERE promo_attr_val.attr_name = 'IS_WALLET_ELIGIBLE' AND promo_attr_val.attr_value = 'Y' AND promotion.promotion_exp_date >= ? AND promotion.promotion_eff_date <= ?
supc_promotion_code: SELECT promo_code.promotion_code FROM promotion INNER JOIN promo_attr_val ON promo_attr_val.promotion_id = promotion.promotion_id INNER JOIN promo_code ON promo_code.promotion_id = promotion.promotion_id LEFT OUTER JOIN wallet_offer_property on wallet_offer_property.promotion_id = promotion.promotion_id RIGHT OUTER JOIN (select promotion_id, attr_name, attr_value from promo_attr_val) pav on pav.promotion_id = promotion.promotion_id WHERE promo_attr_val.attr_name = 'IS_WALLET_ELIGIBLE' AND promo_attr_val.attr_value = 'Y' and promotion.promo_type='SUPC Percent Off Order' AND promotion.promotion_exp_date >= ? and promotion.promotion_eff_date <= ? AND wallet_offer_property.OFFER_BARCODE IS NOT NULL AND wallet_offer_property.STORE_OFFER_CODE IS NOT NULL fetch first row only
supc_expired_promotion_code: SELECT promo_code.promotion_code FROM promotion INNER JOIN promo_attr_val ON promo_attr_val.promotion_id = promotion.promotion_id INNER JOIN promo_code ON promo_code.promotion_id = promotion.promotion_id LEFT OUTER JOIN wallet_offer_property on wallet_offer_property.promotion_id = promotion.promotion_id RIGHT OUTER JOIN (select promotion_id, attr_name, attr_value from promo_attr_val) pav on pav.promotion_id = promotion.promotion_id WHERE promo_attr_val.attr_name = 'IS_WALLET_ELIGIBLE' AND promo_attr_val.attr_value = 'Y' and promotion.promo_type='SUPC Percent Off Order' AND promotion.promotion_exp_date <= ? and promotion.promotion_eff_date <= ? AND wallet_offer_property.OFFER_BARCODE IS NOT NULL AND wallet_offer_property.STORE_OFFER_CODE IS NOT NULL fetch first row only
check_promo_supc: SELECT table_name FROM SYSTEM_GENERATE_ID WHERE table_name = 'promocodeid_?'
promo_code_id: select promo_code_id from promo_code where promotion_code = '?'
wallet_promos_by_count: SELECT unique promo_code.promotion_code, promotion.promotion_id, wallet_offer_property.OFFER_BARCODE, wallet_offer_property.STORE_OFFER_CODE, promotion.PROMOTION_EFF_DATE, promotion.PROMOTION_EXP_DATE FROM promotion INNER JOIN promo_attr_val ON promo_attr_val.promotion_id = promotion.promotion_id INNER JOIN promo_code ON promo_code.promotion_id = promotion.promotion_id LEFT OUTER JOIN wallet_offer_property on wallet_offer_property.promotion_id = promotion.promotion_id RIGHT OUTER JOIN (select promotion_id, attr_name, attr_value from promo_attr_val) pav on pav.promotion_id = promotion.promotion_id WHERE promo_attr_val.attr_name = 'IS_WALLET_ELIGIBLE' AND promo_attr_val.attr_value = 'Y' AND promotion.promotion_exp_date >= (select date_value from custom_date where date_name='CUSTOM_DATE') AND promotion.promotion_eff_date <= (select date_value from custom_date where date_name='CUSTOM_DATE') and promo_code.promotion_code not like '%\_%' escape '\' and promo_code.promotion_code not like '%X%' order by promo_code.promotion_code desc fetch first ? row only
wallet_omnichannel_promo: SELECT wallet_offer_property.OFFER_BARCODE, wallet_offer_property.STORE_OFFER_CODE, promo_code.promotion_code FROM promotion INNER JOIN promo_attr_val ON promo_attr_val.promotion_id = promotion.promotion_id INNER JOIN promo_code ON promo_code.promotion_id = promotion.promotion_id LEFT OUTER JOIN wallet_offer_property on wallet_offer_property.promotion_id = promotion.promotion_id RIGHT OUTER JOIN (select promotion_id, attr_name, attr_value from promo_attr_val where attr_name = 'OFFER_CHANNEL' and attr_value ='Omnichannel') pav on pav.promotion_id = promotion.promotion_id WHERE promo_attr_val.attr_name = 'IS_WALLET_ELIGIBLE' AND promo_attr_val.attr_value = 'Y' and promo_code.promotion_code not like '%\_%' escape '\' fetch first row only
wallet_promo_heading_by_promo_id: select attr_value from promo_attr_val where promotion_id= '?' and attr_name='PROMO_HEADING'
wallet_promo_sub_heading_by_promo_id: select attr_value from promo_attr_val where promotion_id= '?' and attr_name='PROMO_SUB_HEADING'
wallet_promo_disclaimer_by_promo_id: select LEGAL_DISCLAIMER from promotion where promotion_id= '?'
wallet_promo_update_exp_date: UPDATE promotion set promotion_exp_date= '?' where promotion_ID = '?'
promotional_products_with_promo_code: Select Distinct (ps.PROD_ID), pc.PROMOTION_CODE From PROMOTION p LEFT OUTER JOIN PROMO_CODE pc ON p.PROMOTION_ID=pc.PROMOTION_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN PROMOTION_TRIGGER p_trigger ON pc.PROMOTION_ID=p_trigger.PROMOTION_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN PROMO_ATTR_VAL pav ON p_trigger.PROMOTION_ID=pav.PROMOTION_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN PL_PRODUCT_PROMOTIONS ps ON pav.PROMOTION_ID=ps.PROMOTION_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN PRODUCT pr ON ps.PROD_ID = pr.PROD_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN UPC u ON pr.PROD_ID=u.PROD_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN UNARY_PRD_ATTR_VAL upva ON u.PROD_ID=upva.PROD_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN AVAILABILITY a ON u.UPC_ID=a.UPC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN PRICE price ON u.UPC_ID=price.UPC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN PRICE_EVENT p_event ON price.UPC_ID=p_event.UPC_ID WHERE u.display_stat_code=1 and a.AVAILABLE='Y' and a.INV_STATUS_CODE='AVAILABLE' and pr.display_stat_code=1 and pav.ATTR_NAME = 'BADGE_TEXT' and upva.ATTR_NAME = 'INTL_SUPPRESS_PRODUCT' and upva.ATTR_VALUE = 'N' and ps.PROD_ID!=0 and p.PROMO_TYPE in ('Dollar Off Order','Percent Off Order','Free Shipping','Promotional Pricing','Tiered Pricing','Tiered Subtotal Discount') and p.promotion_exp_date >= ? and p.promotion_eff_date <= ? and pr.product_eff_date <= ? and pr.product_exp_date >= ? order by ps.PROD_ID fetch first 10 rows only

AND (unary_cat_attr_vals_browse_type.attr_name = 'CATEGORY_BROWSE_TYPE') AND (unary_cat_attr_vals_browse_type.attr_value = 'Flexible Template')
media_service.category_site_chanel: SELECT category.* FROM category INNER JOIN unary_cat_attr_val unary_cat_attr_vals_brand_name ON unary_cat_attr_vals_brand_name.cat_id = category.cat_id WHERE category.display_stat_code = 1 AND category.cat_id IN (?) AND (category_eff_date <= ?) AND (category_exp_date >= ?) AND (unary_cat_attr_vals_brand_name.attr_name = 'CATEGORY_BRAND') AND (unary_cat_attr_vals_brand_name.attr_value = 'CHANEL')

Address_service.Tax_address_details: SELECT XML_DATA FROM TAX_ADDRESS_SERVICE_LOG WHERE user_id = '?' and SERVICE_NAME = 'ADDRESS_RESPONSE' ORDER BY LAST_UPDATED DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

wallet_credit_card_details.user_credit_card: select * from user_credit_card where user_id=(select user_id from user where email_address = '?')

user_service.user_id_by_email: SELECT user_id from user WHERE email_address = '?'
user_service.get_a_random_user: select u.user_name, u.password from (select rand() rnd, user_name, password from user where user_name like '%blackhole.macys.com%' ) u order by rnd  Fetch first 1 rows only
user_service.get_address_added_to_user: select * from address where address_id IN(select ADDRESS_ID from CONTACT where CONTACT_ID IN(select CONTACT_ID from USER_CONTACT where user_id = (select user_id from user where email_address='?')))
user_service.add_malicious_user: insert into fraud_user (user_id, created) values (?, current_timestamp)
user_service.get_malicious_user: select user_id from fraud_user where user_id = '?'
